column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " I ca n't believe my little girl had to guide Korra into the Spirit World instead of me .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Yeah , Dad went all the time !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " They wo n't have their bending in there .
#Text=But I 've never had bending , and I do n't think I 'd call myself defenseless .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Of course you are n't , because you have your ... um ... " Kya says : " Positive attitude ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " I would 've said acute intellect and cat - like reflexes , but whatever .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Why do n't you two get some sleep .
#Text=" Kya says : " Wake us up if you need some company .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Or if any interesting spirit - y stuff happens , like their bodies start floating around and you need someone to help you grab them before they fly off !
#Text=" Bumi says : " I 'm just saying , we 're here if you need us .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I know you are .
